references: J. Ser, Les Calculs Formels des Séries de Factorielles. Gauthier-Villars, Paris, 1933, p. 93.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).

formula: Conjecture: a = sum(binomial(n+j,j)*(n+j),j=0..n). - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Aug 30 2006Conjecture: a(n)=(n-2)*C(2*n,n)/4, n>=2. - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Feb 28 2007
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
